# The `VAArgInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class represents the va&#95;arg llvm instruction, which returns an argument of the specified type given a va&#95;list and increments that list. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::VAArgInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class represents the va&#95;arg llvm instruction, which returns an argument of the specified type given a va&#95;list and increments that list.
